name: market for long liner, steel | long liner, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20771/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'long liner, steel', in the Global geography.;This market connects the supply chain of long liners, steel from their production till the place they are employed and used. No transportation is considered. Long liner, steel is a fishing vessel made out of (primarily) steel and is used as an infrastructure to the relevant consumers that employ this type of fishing (long lining).

Activity starts after the production of long liner, steel.

Activity ends with the provision of long liner, steel to its relevant consumers.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
